title: Retrieve Treasures · Journey to Sunset Tomb

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第21集:收取宝物·前往落日之墓。

scenes.description: 韩立站在原地想了很久,摇摇头不愿多想六翼霜蚣的事,想起噬金虫和啼魂兽。

visual.composition: Han Li stands thinking for a long time, shakes head, unwilling to dwell on Six-Winged Frost Centipede, remembers Gold Devouring Beetles and Crying Soul Beast

scenes.prompt: Han Li stands thinking for a long time, shakes head, unwilling to dwell on Six-Winged Frost Centipede, remembers Gold Devouring Beetles and Crying Soul Beast.
scenes.narration: 韩立站在原地想了很久，摇摇头不愿多想六翼霜蚣的事，想起噬金虫和啼魂兽。

scenes.description: 韩立脸色一沉,快步疾走,片刻工夫就到了百余丈外的某处地方。

visual.composition: Han Li's face darkens, walks quickly, reaches a place over a hundred zhang away in moments

scenes.prompt: Han Li's face darkens, walks quickly, reaches a place over a hundred zhang away in moments.
scenes.narration: 韩立脸色一沉,快步疾走,片刻工夫就到了百余丈外的某处地方。

scenes.description: 韩立低头看了一眼,二话不说单手一握拳,金光闪动间,对准地面就是狠狠一击。

visual.composition: Han Li looks down, clenches fist without hesitation, golden light flashes, punches ground with full force
visual.character_pose: Han Li punching ground, golden aura

scenes.prompt: Han Li looks down, clenches fist without hesitation, golden light flashes, punches ground with full force.
scenes.narration: 韩立低头看了一眼，二话不说单手一握拳，金光闪动间，对准地面狠狠一击。

scenes.description: 轰的一声巨响,青灰色沙地以韩立为中心彻底爆裂,沙尘掀起高高的蘑菇状灰尘。

visual.composition: A thunderous boom, gray-green sand explodes with Han Li at center, sand dust rising in mushroom cloud
visual.character_pose: Han Li at center, dust cloud rising

scenes.prompt: A thunderous boom, gray-green sand explodes with Han Li at center, sand dust rising in mushroom cloud.
scenes.narration: 轰的一声巨响，青灰色沙地以韩立为中心彻底爆裂，沙尘掀起蘑菇状灰尘。

scenes.description: 一个圆形大坑显现而出,深足有三四丈,宽二十几丈,大坑正中间摆放着一只储物袋和三只灵兽袋。

visual.composition: A circular pit appears, three to four zhang deep, over twenty zhang wide, storage pouch and three spirit beast pouches in center

scenes.prompt: A circular pit appears, three to four zhang deep, over twenty zhang wide, storage pouch and three spirit beast pouches in center.
scenes.narration: 一个圆形大坑显现而出,深足有三四丈,宽二十几丈,大坑正中间摆放着一只储物袋和三只灵兽袋。

scenes.description: 韩立见储物袋袋口完好无损,心中一安,将几只袋子都抓到手中。

visual.composition: Han Li sees storage pouch mouth intact, relieved, grabs all bags in hand

scenes.prompt: Han Li sees storage pouch mouth intact, relieved, grabs all bags in hand.
scenes.narration: 韩立见储物袋袋口完好无损,心中一安,将几只袋子都抓到手中。

scenes.description: 韩立心神微妙联系下,感应到噬金虫和啼魂兽的存在,从一只袋子中传来啼魂兽阵阵酣睡声。

visual.composition: Through subtle connection, Han Li senses Gold Devouring Beetles and Crying Soul Beast, hears Crying Soul Beast's deep sleep sounds from one bag

scenes.prompt: Through subtle connection, Han Li senses Gold Devouring Beetles and Crying Soul Beast, hears deep sleep sounds from one bag.
scenes.narration: 韩立心神微妙联系下,感应到噬金虫和啼魂兽的存在,从一只袋子中传来啼魂兽阵阵酣睡声。

scenes.description: 韩立嘴角一翘,最后一丝担心荡然无存,当即将袋口扎紧,都揣进怀中。

visual.composition: Han Li smiles slightly, last trace of worry gone, ties bag mouths tightly, puts them in his robes
visual.character_pose: Han Li storing bags in robes

scenes.prompt: Han Li smiles slightly, last trace of worry gone, ties bag mouths tightly, puts them in his robes.
scenes.narration: 韩立嘴角一翘,最后一丝担心荡然无存,当即将袋口扎紧,都揣进怀中。

scenes.description: 韩立眉头一皱,六翼霜蚣留下的巨大虫壳颇为麻烦,接连数拳将大坑再扩大。

visual.composition: Han Li frowns, Six-Winged Frost Centipede shell is troublesome, punches several times to expand pit

scenes.prompt: Han Li frowns, Six-Winged Frost Centipede shell is troublesome, punches several times to expand pit.
scenes.narration: 韩立眉头一皱,六翼霜蚣留下的巨大虫壳颇为麻烦,接连数拳将大坑再扩大。

scenes.description: 韩立将整只虫壳扔进大坑中,再用厚厚的沙土掩盖住。

visual.composition: Han Li throws entire shell into pit, covers with thick sand

scenes.prompt: Han Li throws entire shell into pit, covers with thick sand.
scenes.narration: 韩立将整只虫壳扔进大坑中,再用厚厚的沙土掩盖住。

scenes.description: 韩立围着原地转了数圈,确认发现不出什么痕迹后,面露满意之色。

visual.composition: Han Li circles area several times, confirms no traces visible, shows satisfaction

scenes.prompt: Han Li circles area several times, confirms no traces visible, shows satisfaction.
scenes.narration: 韩立围着原地转了数圈,确认发现不出什么痕迹后,面露满意之色。

scenes.description: 韩立抬头看了看远处黑云消失的方向,脸色阴厉了片刻,蓦然一转身朝相反方向扬长而去。

visual.composition: Han Li looks up at distant direction where black cloud disappeared, face darkens briefly, suddenly turns and strides opposite direction

scenes.prompt: Han Li looks up at distant direction where black cloud disappeared, face darkens briefly, suddenly turns and strides opposite direction.
scenes.narration: 韩立抬头看了看远处黑云消失的方向,脸色阴厉了片刻,蓦然一转身朝相反方向扬长而去。

scenes.description: 韩立远行的目标,是千万里外的一座颇负盛名的妖兽之地。

visual.composition: Han Li's journey goal is a famous beast land tens of millions of li away

scenes.prompt: Han Li's journey goal is a famous beast land tens of millions of li away.
scenes.narration: 韩立远行的目标,是千万里外的一座颇负盛名的妖兽之地。

scenes.description: 那里是天元境和某一妖地相邻的边缘之地,整片区域横跨天元境和妖兽之地。

visual.composition: That place is borderland between Tianyuan Realm and a beast land, entire region spans both realms

scenes.prompt: That place is borderland between Tianyuan Realm and a beast land, entire region spans both realms.
scenes.narration: 那里是天元境和某一妖地相邻的边缘之地,整片区域横跨天元境和妖兽之地。

scenes.description: 此区域最广阔最大的一部分,属于三不管的地方,作为缓冲之用。

visual.composition: The largest part of this region is a neutral buffer zone, ungoverned by anyone
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking through dangerous land

scenes.prompt: The largest part of this region is a neutral buffer zone, ungoverned by anyone.
scenes.narration: 此区域最广阔最大的一部分,属于三不管的地方,作为缓冲之用。

scenes.description: 此区域妖兽、蛮荒古兽以及众多半妖人频繁活动,越到中间最广阔地方也就危险之极。

visual.composition: This region has frequent activity by beast cultivators, ancient beasts, and many half-demons, extremely dangerous toward center

scenes.prompt: This region has frequent activity by beast cultivators, ancient beasts, and many half-demons, extremely dangerous toward center.
scenes.narration: 此区域妖兽、蛮荒古兽以及众多半妖人频繁活动,越到中间最广阔地方也就危险之极。

scenes.description: 据说还有人见到化神小成的神秘灵族,也见过高达数十丈的上古巨人,还有人声称听到过类似真龙的吼声。

visual.composition: Legends say people have seen mysterious Spirit Clan at early Deity Transformation, ancient giants dozens of zhang tall, even heard sounds like true dragons
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking, mysterious figures in distance

scenes.prompt: Legends say people have seen mysterious Spirit Clan at early Deity Transformation, ancient giants dozens of zhang tall, even heard sounds like true dragons.
scenes.narration: 据说还有人见到化神小成的神秘灵族,也见过高达数十丈的上古巨人,还有人声称听到过类似真龙的吼声。

scenes.description: 此地方一直未遭人妖两族正式开发,里面灵脉灵药丰富之极,连三皇等存在也颇为重视。

visual.composition: This place has never been officially developed by human and demon races, rich in spirit veins and medicines, even Three Emperors value it
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking, rich resources visible

scenes.prompt: This place has never been officially developed by human and demon races, rich in spirit veins and medicines, even Three Emperors value it.
scenes.narration: 此地方一直未遭人妖两族正式开发,里面灵脉灵药丰富之极,连三皇等存在也颇为重视。

scenes.description: 有大量修士、炼体士前赴后继涌来,有的是想碰运气得到灵药,有的是借此地杀戮突破修炼瓶颈。

visual.composition: Many cultivators and body cultivators come here, some seeking luck for spirit medicines, others using killing here to break bottlenecks
visual.character_pose: Multiple figures in distance, Han Li among them

scenes.prompt: Many cultivators and body cultivators come here, some seeking luck for spirit medicines, others using killing here to break bottlenecks.
scenes.narration: 有大量修士、炼体士前赴后继涌来,有的是想碰运气得到灵药,有的是借此地杀戮突破修炼瓶颈。

scenes.description: 韩立经过数年风尘仆仆的赶路,终于到了这片边境之地。

visual.composition: Han Li after years of dusty travel, finally reaches this borderland
visual.character_pose: Han Li arriving, borderland visible ahead

scenes.prompt: Han Li after years of dusty travel, finally reaches this borderland.
scenes.narration: 韩立经过数年风尘仆仆的赶路,终于到了这片边境之地。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第22集即将开始。
